content: Those who have achieved harmony in their thoughts, words, and actions attain true awakening.
In life two types of people meet failure: one who thinks right and does not follow up with action; the other, who does the actions without thinking.
God has himself given eyes, ears, hands, feet and nostrils in pairs, but tongue is only one. Therefore, speak less and do more.
A lamp does not speak, it introduces itself through its light. Do not indulge in too much self praise. Give a chance to people to judge yourself purely through your actions.
